//Test case 1			
addi $sp, $sp, -20
addi $t0, $0, 1
loop:
slti $t1, $t0, 5
beq  $t1, $0, exit
sll $t1, $t0, 2
add $t1, $t1, $sp
sw $t0, 0($t1)
addi $t0, $t0, 1
j loop
exit:

//Hex
23bdffec
20080001
29090005
11200005
00084880
013d4820
ad280000
08000002

//Machine Code
00100011101111011111111111101100
00100000000010000000000000000001
00101001000010010000000000000101
00010001001000000000000000000101
00000000000010000100100010000000
00000001001111010100100000100000
10101101001010000000000000000000
00100001000010000000000000000001
00001000000000000000000000000010

_________________________________________

//Test Case 2
addi $a0, $sp, 0
jal sum
addi $s0, $v0, 0
j exit
sum:
addi $t1, $a0, 0
loop:
slti $t2, $t0, 5
beq $t2, $0, exitLoop
lw $t3, 0($t1)
addi $t1, $t1, 4
addi $t0, $t0, 1
add $t4, $t4, $t3
j loop
exitLoop:
addi $v0, $t4, 0
jr $ra
exit:

//HEX
23a40000
0c000004
20500000
0800000e
20890000
290a0005
11400005
8d2b0000
21290004
21080001
018b6020
08000005
21820000
03e00008

//Machine Code
00100011101001000000000000000000
00001100000000000000000000000100
00100000010100000000000000000000
00001000000000000000000000001110
00100000100010010000000000000000
00101001000010100000000000000101
00010001010000000000000000000101
10001101001010110000000000000000
00100001001010010000000000000100
00100001000010000000000000000001
00000001100010110110000000100000
00001000000000000000000000000101
00100001100000100000000000000000
00000011111000000000000000001000

_________________________________________


//Test Case 3

addi $sp, $sp, -4
addi $t0, $0, 0
loop:
slti $t1, $t0, 4
beq  $t1, $0, exit
add $t1, $sp, $t0
addi $t0, $t0, 1
sb $t0, 0($t1)
j loop
exit:
lb $s0, 0($sp)
lb $s1, 1($sp)
lb $s2, 2($sp)
lb $s3, 3($sp)
addi $t2, $0, -1
addi $sp, $sp, -1
sb $t2, 0($sp)
lb $s4, 0($sp)
lbu $s5, 0($sp)

//HEX

20080000
29090004
11200004
03a84820
21080001
a1280000

83b30003
